entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY ENDED, Guelph
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:46 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Guelph Turfgrass Institute 9:00 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 84 %

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
